name: Ten Minute Mystery: Murder at the Asylum
name_original: Ten Minute Mystery: Murder at the Asylum
description:
A murder has been committed in an insane asylum! With no evidence or clues, a detective must solve the crime by deciphering the eyewitness testimonies of stark raving lunatics!

Ten-Minute Mysteries: Murder in the Asylum is a text-based puzzle game in which players must solve a series of word-based puzzles in order to gain clues and catch the killer.
